title: Vinachain
preSaleSubTitle: Not just an average bot, Vinachain was developed to provide a powerful trading tool and token sniper for users across the Base ecosystem at no cost. With the vision to simplify the trading experience and optimize capital efficiency, Vinachain built-in features are designed to offer a user-friendly interface and various yield strategies.
baseMainetDesc: Launchpad and Distribution on Base Mainet
referenceSubTitle: You will earn 5% of VinaToken from participants who purchased with your referral link.
linkAddress: Please send this link to your friends to receive a commission.
welcomeSubTitle: Vinachain is the community-run technology powering the cryptocurrency vina (VNC) and thousands of decentralized applications.
startedSubTitle: vinachain.org is your portal into the world of Vinachain. The tech is new and ever-evolving ‚Äì it helps to have a guide. Here's what we recommend you do if you want to dive in.
pickAWalletSubTitle: A wallet lets you connect to Vinachain and manage your funds
getVinaSubTitle: Vina is the currency of Vinachain - you can use it in applications
useADappSubTitle: Dapps is an application powered by Vinachain. See what you can do
whatIsVianChainSubTitle: Vinatoken is a technology that's home to digital money, global payments, and applications. The community has built a booming digital economy, bold new ways for creators to earn online, and so much more. It's open to everyone, wherever you are in the world ‚Äì all you need is the internet.
aFairerFinancialSystemSubTitle: Today, billions of people can‚Äôt open bank accounts, others have their payments blocked. VinaChain‚Äôs decentralized finance (DeFi) system never sleeps or discriminates. With just an internet connection, you can send, receive, borrow, earn interest, and even stream funds anywhere in the world.
theInternetOfAssetsSubTitle: Vinachain isn't just for digital money. Anything you can own can be represented, traded and put to use as non-fungible tokens (NFTs). You can tokenise your art and get royalties automatically every time it's re-sold. Or use a token for something you own to take out a loan. The possibilities are growing all the time.
anOpenInternetSubTitle: Today, we gain access to 'free' internet services by giving up control of our personal data. Vinachain services are open by default ‚Äì you just need a wallet. These are free and easy to set up, controlled by you, and work without any personal info
aFrontierForDevelopersSubTitle: Vinachain and its apps are transparent and open source. You can fork code and re-use functionality others have already built. If you don't want to learn a new language you can just interact with open-sourced code using JavaScript and other existing languages.
totalVinaSkatedDesc: The total amount of Vinachain currently being staked and securing the network.
nodesDesc: VinaChain is run by thousands of volunteers around the globe, known as nodes.
transactionsTodayDesc: The number of transactions successfully processed on the network in the last 24 hour
valueLockedInDefiDesc: The amount of money in decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, the Vinachain digital economy.
communityVinachainDesc: Join our monthly community calls for exciting updates on vinachain.org development and important ecosystem news. Get the chance to ask questions, share ideas, and provide feedback - it's the perfect opportunity to be part of the thriving Vinachain community.
upgradeKnowlegdeDesc: A wallet lets you connect to Vinachain and manage your funds

aboutUs.aboutVinascanContent: Vinascan is the leading block explorer and search, API & analytics platform for Vinachain.
aboutUs.aboutVinascanSubContent: Built and launched in 2015 Vinascan is one of the earliest and longest-running independent projects built for Vinachain and its community, with the mission of providing equitable access to blockchain data.
aboutUs.meetTheVinascannersContent: A team truly passionate and excited about the kinds of decentralized information and infrastructure applications that Vinachain makes possible.
aboutUs.withSupportFromContent: The many passionate & talented community members, developers and organizations in the Vinachain community.

contactUs.title: Contact Us

contactUs.knowledgeBaseContentRest: The links on the right might already have the answer to your inquiry. If they don't, perhaps one of the other articles in our
contactUs.communitySupportContent: We will never ask for your private keys or passwords.
contactUs.communitySupportContentRest: While we try our best to respond in a timely manner, we often have a backlog of inquiries. Please do not
contactUs.relatedIssuesContent: Kindly reach out to your wallet service provider, exchanges or project/contract owner for further support as they are in a better position to assist you on the issues related to and from their platforms.

terms.title: Terms of Service

terms.eligibilityContent1: You represent and warrant that you: (a) are of legal age to form a binding contract; (b) have not previously been suspended or removed from using our Services; and (c) have full power and authority to enter into this agreement and in doing so will not violate any other agreement to which you are a party.

terms.suspensionTerminationContent1: In the event of any Force Majeure Event, breach of these Terms, or any other event that would make provision of the Services commercially unreasonable for Company, we may, in our discretion and without liability to you, with or without prior notice, suspend your access to all or a portion of our Services.
terms.suspensionTerminationContent2: We may terminate your access to the Services in our sole discretion, immediately and without prior notice, and delete or deactivate your Account and all related information and files in such account without liability to you, including, for instance, in the event that you breach any term of these Terms.
terms.cookieStatementContent1: This site uses cookies. Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer by websites that you visit. They are widely used in order to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site. Cookies are typically stored on your computer's hard drive.
terms.cookieStatementContent2: Information collected from cookies is used by us to evaluate the effectiveness of our Site, analyze trends, and manage the platform. The information collected from cookies allows us to determine such things as which parts of our Site are most visited and difficulties our visitors may experience in accessing our Site. With this knowledge, we can improve the quality of your experience on the platform by recognizing and delivering more of the most desired features and information, as well as by resolving access difficulties. We also use cookies and/or a technology known as web bugs or clear gifs, which are typically stored in emails to help us confirm your receipt of, and response to, our emails and to provide you with a more personalized experience when using our Site.
terms.cookieStatementContent3: We also use third party service provider(s), to assist us in better understanding the use of our Site. Our service provider(s) will place cookies on the hard drive of your computer and will receive information that we select that will educate us on such things as how visitors navigate around our site, what pages are browsed and general transaction information. Our service provider(s) analyses this information and provides us with aggregate reports. The information and analysis provided by our service provider(s) will be used to assist us in better understanding our visitors' interests in our Site and how to better serve those interests. The information collected by our service provider(s) may be linked to and combined with information that we collect about you while you are using the platform. Our service provider(s) is/are contractually restricted from using information they receive from our Site other than to assist us.
terms.cookieStatementContent4: Your continued use of this site, as well as any subsequent usage, will be interpreted as your consent to cookies being stored on your device.
terms.disclaimerOfWarrantiesContent1: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW, AND EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED TO THE CONTRARY IN A WRITING BY US, OUR SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN ‚ÄúAS IS‚Äù AND ‚ÄúAS AVAILABLE‚Äù BASIS TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW. WE EXPRESSLY DISCLAIM, AND YOU WAIVE, ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT AS TO OUR SERVICES, INCLUDING THE INFORMATION, CONTENT AND MATERIALS CONTAINED THEREIN.

YOU ARE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR BACKING UP AND MAINTAINING DUPLICATE COPIES OF ANY INFORMATION YOU STORE OR TRANSFER THROUGH OUR SERVICES.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.pleaseReadThePrivacyPolicyCarefully: PLEASE READ THE PRIVACY POLICY CAREFULLY.
privacy.pleaseReadThePrivacyPolicyCarefullyConte: Vinascan.io (referred to as the ‚ÄúCompany‚Äù, ‚ÄúVinascan‚Äù, ‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúour‚Äù or ‚Äúus‚Äù) is committed to the protection of your Personal Data and takes the matter of protecting your privacy as high priority.
privacy.typeOfDataWeCollectContent1: The types of Personal Data that we collect directly from you or from third parties depend on the circumstances of collection and on the nature of the service requested or transaction undertaken. It may include (but is not limited to):
privacy.typeOfDataWeCollectContent11: personal information that links back to an individual, e.g., name, gender, date of birth, and other personal identification numbers;
privacy.typeOfDataWeCollectContent12: contact information, e.g., address, phone number and email address;
privacy.typeOfDataWeCollectContent13: technical information, e.g., IP address for API services and login;
privacy.typeOfDataWeCollectContent14: statistical data, e.g., hits to website.
privacy.typeOfDataWeCollectContent2: This Privacy Policy covers the information we collect about you when you use our products or services, or otherwise interact with Vinascan, unless a different privacy policy is displayed. This policy also explains your choices about how we use information about you.
privacy.typeOfDataWeCollectContent3: Your choices include how you can object to certain uses of information about you and how you can access and update certain information about you. If you do not agree to the terms of this Policy, please do not use the Site, or any of our Services. Each time you use any Site, or any Services, the current version of this Privacy Policy will apply.
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalData: HOW DO WE COLLECT PERSONAL DATA?
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent1: This Privacy Policy covers any Personal Data provided to us:
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent11: when you engage with our products and services;
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent12: when you create an account with us;
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent13: under any other contractual agreement or arrangement.
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent2: Some of the other ways we may collect Personal Data shall include (but is not limited to):
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent21: communications with you via telephone, letter, fax and email;
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent23: when you contact us in person;
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent24: when we contact you in person;
privacy.howDoWeCollectPersonalDataContent25: when we collect information about you from third parties; and other channels including our support helpdesk.
privacy.howDoWeCollectYourPersonalDataOnYourWebs: HOW DO WE COLLECT YOUR PERSONAL DATA ON OUR WEBSITE?
From our website, we collect your Personal Data in the following ways:
IP address
We use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server, and to administer our website.
Cookies

A cookie is an element of data that a website can send to your browser, which may then store it on your system. We use cookies in some of our pages to store your preferences and record session information.

The information that we collect is then used to ensure a more personalized service level for our users. You can adjust settings on your browser so that you will be notified when you receive a cookie. Please refer to your browser documentation to check if cookies have been enabled on your computer or to request not to receive cookies.

As cookies allow you to take advantage of some of the Website‚Äôs essential features, we recommend that you accept cookies. For instance, if you block or otherwise reject our cookies, you will not be able to use any products or services on the website that may require you to log-in (token holdings store cookies for favorite).

It is important that you prevent unauthorized access to your password and your computer. You should always log out after using a shared computer. Information collected from cookies is used by us to evaluate the effectiveness of our site, analyze trends, and manage the platform. The information collected from cookies allows us to determine such things as which parts of our site are most visited and difficulties our visitors may experience in accessing our site.

With this knowledge, we can improve the quality of your experience on the platform by recognizing and delivering more of the most desired features and information, as well as by resolving access difficulties. We also use cookies and/or a technology known as web bugs or clear gifs, which are typically stored in emails to help us confirm your receipt of, and response to our emails and to provide you with a more personalized experience when using our site. Your continued use of this site, as well as any subsequent usage, will be interpreted as your consent to cookies being stored on your device.
User feedback form

Our feedback form requires you to give us contact information (e.g. your name and email address) so that we can respond to your comments. We use your contact information from the registration form to send you information about our company. Your contact information is also used to contact you where necessary.
General Site tracking

We also use third party service provider(s), to assist us in better understanding the use of our site. Our service provider(s) will place cookies on the hard drive of your computer and will receive information that we select, for example, how visitors navigate around our site, what pages are browsed and general transaction information. Our service provider(s) analyzes this information and provides us with aggregate reports.

The information and analysis provided by our service provider(s) will be used to assist us in better understanding our visitors' interests in our site and how to better serve those interests. The information collected by our service provider(s) may be linked to and combined with information that we collect about you while you are using the platform. Our service provider(s) is/are contractually restricted from using information they receive from our Site other than to assist us.
Web Server site visits logging
The following is how we store the web server site visit logs (applicable to https://vinascan.io):
To throttle the rate of requests and prevent certain types of attacks against us, we track the incoming IP addresses for very short periods of time and is then released.
By default, we do NOT store identifiable 'x-forwarded-for' originating IPs during your site visit in the Web Server site visits logs.
However in the event of certain types of third-party attacks, general server/application troubleshooting or other related reasons, we might temporarily activate the 'x-forwarded-for' logging.
As part of our routine server maintenance, all raw web server site visit logs are retained for a minimum of 5 days only and then purged on an automated scheduled basis.
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataFor: WHAT DO WE USE YOUR PERSONAL DATA FOR?
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent: We may use your Personal Data for the following purposes:
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent1: to enable us to provide our services and perform our services to you;
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent2: to protect the safety and well being of yourself and/or other customers;
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent3: to investigate and respond to claims and inquiries from you;
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent4: for business development purposes such as statistical and marketing analysis, systems testing, maintenance and development, customer surveys or to help us in any future dealings with you, for example by identifying your requirements and preference;
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent5: to comply with any legal or regulatory requirements; and/ or
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent6: for all other purposes ancillary to any of the purposes stated above.
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent7: to communicate offers, product, services and information on products and activities;
privacy.whatDoWeUseYourPersonalDataForContent8: marketing/cross-marketing and communicating with you in relation to products and services offered by us and our service partners as well as our appointed agents; and/or
privacy.accessingCorrectingUpdatingYourPersonalD: ACCESSING / CORRECTING / UPDATING YOUR PERSONAL DATA

You may request to obtain information of your personal data and also update or make amendments to your personal data as below: (a) for online registered customers, you may login to your online account and update your personal data.

Please note that depending on the information requested, a nominal fee may be charged and/or backed by the Vinachain signed message. We will endeavour to provide the information back to you as soon as practicable. However we also reserve the right to validate all requests for the authenticity of the request.
privacy.withdrawingConsentContent1: Please note that it is obligatory for the Company to process your Personal Data for the Core Purpose as stated above, without which some services or features provided by Vinascan may be affected.
privacy.withdrawingConsentContent2: If we do not have your consent to process your Personal Data for the Ancillary Purposes, we will not be able to keep you updated about our future, new and/or enhanced services and products. Nevertheless, you may stop receiving promotional activities by:
privacy.withdrawingConsentContent22: editing the relevant account settings to unsubscribe; or
privacy.toWhomDoWeDiscloseYourPersonalDataConten: TO WHOM DO WE DISCLOSE YOUR PERSONAL DATA?

We will not trade or sell your Personal Data to third parties. Your Personal Data shall only be disclosed or transferred to the following third parties appointed or authorised by the Company for the fulfilment of the Purpose of: (a) data warehouses; (b) IT service providers; (c) data analytics and/or marketing agency; (d) legal bodies as permitted or required by law such as in compliance with a warrant or subpoena issued by a court of competent jurisdiction; and/or (e) regulatory authorities applicable to you; and/or (f) safety and security personnel.

In addition to the above, your Personal Data may also be disclosed or transferred to any of the Company‚Äôs actual and potential assignee, transferee or acquirer (including our affiliates and subsidiaries) or our business, assets or group companies, or in connection with any corporate restructuring or exercise including the our restructuring to transfer the business, assets and/or liabilities.

We shall take practical steps to ensure that their employees, officers, agents, consultants, contractors and such other third parties mentioned above who are involved in the collection, use and disclosure of your Personal Data will observe and adhere to the terms of this Privacy Statement.

We are subject to various legal and regulatory obligations imposed by the laws and supervisory authorities of various jurisdictions e.g., anti-money laundering laws, anti-terrorism financing, financial services laws, corporation laws and privacy laws. These obligations may require us to process certain data for payment processing, compliance with court orders or other purposes not disclosed herein.
privacy.howLongWillWeRetainYourPersonalData: HOW LONG WILL WE RETAIN YOUR PERSONAL DATA?
privacy.howLongWillWeRetainYourPersonalDataConte: The Company stores data in global hosting provider with servers across regions and we shall take all reasonable steps to ensure that all Personal Data is destroyed or permanently deleted when no longer required for the Purpose and prepare a disposal schedule for inactive data after 24 month period.
privacy.linksToThirdPartyWebsitesContent1: We may link this website and/or our applications to other companies‚Äô or organizations‚Äô websites (collectively, ‚ÄúThird Party Sites‚Äù). This Privacy Notice does not apply to such Third Party Sites as those sites are outside our control. If you access Third Party Sites using the links provided, the operators of these sites may collect your personal information.
privacy.linksToThirdPartyWebsitesContent2: Please ensure that you are satisfied with the privacy statements of these Third Party Sites before you submit any personal information. We try, as far as we can, to ensure that all third party linked sites have equivalent measures for protection of your personal information, but we cannot be held responsible legally or otherwise for the activities, privacy policies or levels of privacy compliance of these Third Party Sites.
privacy.additionalInformationOrAssistanceContent: Please note that this Privacy Statement may be amended from time to time in accordance to applicable laws and regulations and such variations may be applicable to you.

For further inquiries or complaints in relation to our handling of your Personal Data or our Privacy Policy or wish to access, update or amend your Personal Data as mentioned above please contact us via our feedback form at

bugBounty.title: Bug Bounty Program
bugBounty.guidelinesContent1: Make every effort to avoid privacy violations, degradation of user experience, disruption to production systems, and destruction of data during security testing
bugBounty.guidelinesContent2: Use the identified communication channels to report vulnerability information to us
bugBounty.guidelinesContent3: Report vulnerabilities as soon as you discover it, but keep it confidential between yourself and Vinascan until we‚Äôve resolve the issue
bugBounty.guidelinesContent4: Provide us with at least 7 working days to investigate the issue and revert back to you
bugBounty.ifYouAreTheFirstToReportTheIssue: If you are the first to report the issue, and we make a code or configuration change based on the issue, we commit to:
bugBounty.ifYouAreTheFirstToReportTheIssueContent1: Recognize your contribution on Vinascan.io (list below for the last 50 contributors)
bugBounty.ifYouAreTheFirstToReportTheIssueContent2: Reward you with a bounty (up to a maximum of $2500 paid out per month):
$1000-$3000 in crypto equivalent if you identified a vulnerability that presented a critical risk *
$500 in crypto equivalent if you identified a vulnerability that presented a high risk *
$250 in crypto equivalent if you identified a vulnerability that presented a moderate risk *
$0 in crypto equivalent if you identified a vulnerability that presented a low risk *
Entry in Hall of Fame Only, If there was in fact no or low risk vulnerability, but we still made a code or configuration change nonetheless
bugBounty.ifYouAreTheFirstToReportTheIssueContent3: Researcher will provide us with a wallet address based on the reported explorer for the payout within 7 days after we have resolved the issue.
bugBounty.ifYouAreTheFirstToReportTheIssueContent4: * vulnerability level will be determined at our discretion
bugBounty.ifYouAreTheFirstToReportTheIssueContent5: ** in the event the vulnerabilty exists in multiple explorers, only the reported explorer is entitled to the rewards
bugBounty.scopeContent2: We are interested in the following vulnerabilities:
bugBounty.scopeContent25: Access Control Issues (IDOR, Privilege Escalation, etc)
bugBounty.scopeContent28: Other vulnerability with a clear potential loss
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent: Vulnerabilities found in out of scope resources are unlikely to be rewarded unless they present a serious business risk (at our sole discretion). In general, the following vulnerabilities do not correspond to the severity threshold
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent2: Findings derived primarily from social engineering (e.g. phishing, etc)
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent3: Findings from applications or systems not listed in the ‚ÄòScope‚Äô section
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent4: UI/UX bugs, Data entry errors, spelling mistakes, typos, etc
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent5: Network level Denial of Service (DoS/DDoS) vulnerabilities
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent7: DNS issues (i.e. MX records, SPF records, etc.)
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent8: Server configuration issues (i.e., open ports, TLS, etc.)
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent10: Security bugs in third-party applications or services
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent11: XSS Exploits that do not pose a security risk to 'other' users (Self-XSS)
bugBounty.outOfScopeContent13: https/ssl or server-info disclosure related issues
bugBounty.howToReportASecurityVulnerability: How to Report a Security Vulnerability
bugBounty.howToReportASecurityVulnerabilityContent: Description of the location and potential impact of the vulnerability
A detailed description of the steps required to reproduce the vulnerability (POC scripts, screenshots, and compressed screen captures are all helpful to us)
Your name/handle and a link for recognition in our Hall of Fame (twitter, reddit, facebook, hackerone, etc)
bugBounty.hallOfFameContent: Special thanks to the following researchers for helping us make Etherscan and other explorers a better place

brandAssets.title: Vinascan Brand Assets & Guidelines
brandAssets.subTitle: Thank you for your support and loving our work. Below, we have provided a few guidelines for using our brand assets.
brandAssets.ourBrandNameContent: is one word and spelled with a capital E.
brandAssets.brandingGuidelinesContent1: You may use the Vinascan name and logo in your website or app as long as you adhere to the Vinascan branding guidelines.
brandAssets.brandingGuidelinesContent11: Do not alter the Vinascan logo. The logo is to be used as provided.
brandAssets.brandingGuidelinesContent12: Do not combine Vinascan logo with other images without consent.
brandAssets.brandingGuidelinesContent13: Do not use the Vinascan brand in any way that implies a relationship, affiliation, or endorsement. For example,
brandAssets.brandingGuidelinesContent15: Do not use the Vinascan brand in conjunction with any illegal and unlawful activity, promotion, and product.
brandAssets.downloadsContent: We like to keep things simple, so we have put together a package for the brand assets that you can download and use in your website or app.
brandAssets.agreementContent: By using our brand assets, you agree to adhere to our Branding Guidelines as well as our
brandAssets.agreementContentRest: . For further information about use of the Vinascan name that is not covered by the Branding Guidelines, please

block.title: Block
block.note: Click to show more Blocks are batches of transactions linked via cryptographic hashes. Any tampering of a block would invalidate all following blocks as all subsequent hashes would change. Learn more about this page in our Knowledge Base.

transactionPage.title: Transactions
transactionPage.note: A transaction is a cryptographically signed instruction that changes the blockchain state. Block explorers track the details of all transactions in the network. Learn more about transactions in our Knowledge Base.

modalCard.customizeThisCard: Customize this card by selecting one of the options below.

swapPage.title: Swap VPL to VPC
swapPage.pleaseEnterYourTransaction: Please enter your transaction to complete the swap.
swapPage.pleaseTransferText: The completion of the transfer requires sending {{amount}} to the wallet address {{address}}. Please copy the transaction code and paste it into the box below.
swapPage.transactionCannotReverse: The transaction once executed cannot be reversed. Please double-check the information before proceeding.
swapPage.transactionHasbeenRecorded: Transaction has been recorded. We will convert and send it to you in 1 - 3 days
swapPage.connectWalletToShowAddress: Connect your wallet to show address
swapPage.purchasingAndWaitConfirmation: Purchasing and wait confirmation. Please don't leave out or reload page.
swapPage.walletAddressNotMatch: Wallet address not match. Please try connect with the correct wallet

settings.title: Site Settings
settings.subTitle: This page allows you to customize your browsing experience on Etherscan.

advancedMode.title: Advanced Mode
advancedMode.content: Show transactions and blocks details in full. Useful for developers to debug in single view. Will also display revert error messages from token contracts without an updated token info.
advancedMode.note: *Note: Caution recommended when interacting with error messages that direct you to perform additional steps or visit external sites

ignoreToken.title: Ignore Tokens with Poor Reputation
ignoreToken.content: Hide all transactions of tokens that have been flagged by Etherscan as Suspicious, Unsafe, Spam or Brand Infringement from being displayed on the site.
ignoreToken.note: *Note: This is a Beta feature with ongoing improvements

tolenTransfers.title: Zero-Value Token Transfers
tolenTransfers.content: Hide zero-value token transfers from being displayed on the site
tolenTransfers.note: *Note: This is a Beta feature with ongoing improvements

highlights.title: Address and Method Highlight
highlights.content: Highlight all occurrences of an address or method in a given page upon hover

addressDisplay.title: Address Display
addressDisplay.content: Choose desired address hash truncation format
addressDisplay.note: *Note: Back truncation allows for finding address hash in page (CTRL+F)

domainName.title: Default Domain Name
domainName.note: The selected provider's name tags will be prioritized by default in cases where an address has reverse resolution set up for both providers.

time.title: Date Time Format
time.content: Select whether to display Date Time in UTC or local (UTC+7) time zone

pendingTransaction.title: Pending Transaction
pendingTransaction.pendingTransactionPoolTooltip: Click to see Pending Transaction Bool - Time Seiries

uncles.noteContent: Uncle blocks are created when two or more miners create blocks at nearly the same time. Only one block can be mined and accepted as canonical on the blockchain. Learn more about this page in our
